com.netflix.nicobar.core.archive

Interface ScriptArchive

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JarScriptArchive, PathScriptArchive, SingleFileScriptArchive

    public interface ScriptArchive
    Data object which represents a bundle of scripts and associated resources. Also contains a ScriptModuleSpec to describe how this archive is to be converted into a module, and optionally, a set of deploy specs that describes deploy data useful in operating the module.

    • Method Detail

      • getModuleSpec

        ScriptModuleSpec getModuleSpec()
        Returns:
        the module spec for this archive

      • setModuleSpec

        void setModuleSpec(ScriptModuleSpec spec)
        Set the module spec for this archive. This will override an already set module spec.
        Parameters:
        spec - the module spec to set to.

      • getRootUrl

        @Nullable
java.net.URL getRootUrl()
        Returns:
        URLs representing the contents of this archive. should be suitable for passing to a URLClassLoader

      • getArchiveEntryNames

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getArchiveEntryNames()
        Returns:
        relative path names of all the entries in the script archive.

      • getEntry

        @Nullable
java.net.URL getEntry(java.lang.String entryName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        a URL to the resource.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getCreateTime

        long getCreateTime()
        Timestamp used to resolve multiple revisions of the archive. If multiple archives are submitted with the same moduleId, only the one with the highest timestamp will be used.
